title: Ticket #6017: Add a "universe feature summary table" to the manual
description:
As per Miron at today's team meeting -- he wants a table that lists major features, and whether they work for each universe (e.g., condor_ssh_to_job, do you get an exit code, etc.).

I have to think about where this should go, and see if we already have anything like this.
creator: wenger
